    if = {
        limit = {
            state = 87

                has_state_flag = state_name_german
            }
        }
		  if ={
		limit ={
		
		GER={has_country_flag = gremanisationfullpol}
		}
		GER={transfer_state = 87}

		}
		else={
		set_state_name = "Lodsch"
		}
